articles.title: Yasiel Puig Says Vin Scully Was A Father Figure, I'm So Sad He's Gone - TMZ
articles.description: Ex-Dodgers star Yasiel Puig says he's heartbroken over Vin Scully's death, telling TMZ Sports the legendary broadcaster was a father figure to him.
